DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability fluvastatin 80 mg Chinese population . This study recruit patient US .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fluvastatin Different Doses Adults With Mixed Dyslipidemia Primary Hypercholesterolemia
